original_definition: 'open cabinet' means a professional refrigerated storage cabinet whose refrigerated enclosure can be reached from the outside without opening a door or a drawer, where the mere presence of one compartment which can be reached from the outside without opening a door or a drawer, with a net volume equivalent to less than 20 % of the professional refrigerated storage cabinet's total volume, is not sufficient to qualify it as such;
generated_definition: 'open cabinet' means a cabinet that is accessible to the public or authorized individuals without any restrictions or limitations on access
